title: 4-year-old is one of 2 people shot in McKeesport
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
A 4-year-old child was one of two people shot inside a home in McKeesport early Tuesday.
Neighbors on Evans Avenue told Channel 11 News they heard several shots fired at around 3 a.m.
Channel 11’s Steven Fisher reported the second shooting victim is a 20 year-old woman.
Police said several shots were fired into the back of the house, with several bullets going inside and striking the two victims. Police also said it was the same house that was shot up Saturday morning.
"Lately, it's gone downhill," said Bill Dougherty, a resident.
Fisher also reported that shots were fired at the same house on Saturday. %INLINE%
"They're not small guns. They're pretty big, they sound like cannons going off," resident Georgette Silah said.
No arrests have been made.
Details about the victims' conditions were not immediately available.
